text: (to tum dekhate kya hota) ai eemaanadaaron shaitaan ke qadam ba qadam na chalo aur jo shakhs shaitaan ke qadam ba qadam chalega to vah yaqeenan use badakaaree aur buree baat (karane) ka hukm dega aur agar tum par khuda ka fazal (va karam) aur usakee rahamat na hotee to tumamen se koee bhee kabhee paak saaph na hota magar khuda to jise chahata hai paak saaph kar deta hai aur khuda bada sunane vaala vaakiphakaar hai
